sys_script_include.name: NeedItUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_66cbab1e93b2ca10ba1575dcebba10d9
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utils Script Include for the NeedIt application.
</description><name>NeedItUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItUtils = Class.create();
NeedItUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    isDatePast: function(strDate) {
        // Create GlideDateTime objects for the current date and the passed in date
        var rightnow = new GlideDateTime();
        var testdate = new GlideDateTime(strDate);

        // If the testdate is before rightnow, return true, else return false
        if (testdate.before(rightnow)) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
    type: 'NeedItUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-17 14:18:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>66cbab1e93b2ca10ba1575dcebba10d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_66cbab1e93b2ca10ba1575dcebba10d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 14:18:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
